item.title: 据彭博社报道，墨西哥石油公司将裁员 3000 多人，以节省超过 5.4 亿美元的开支
item.description: 据彭博社援引一份日期为 4 月份的公司文件报道，墨西哥国家石油公司 Pemex 计划裁减 3000 多名长期员工，并在此过程中节省约 105 亿比索（约合 5.434 亿美元）的开支。【原文：Mexican state oil company Pemex plans to layoff over 3000 tenured employees and save up around 10.5 billion pesos ($543.40 million) in the process, Bloomberg reported citing a company document dated April.】

item.title: 美国最高法院称美联储是独一无二的，缓解了对特朗普能否解雇鲍威尔的担忧
item.description: 美国最高法院周四就唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇两名联邦劳工委员会成员的法律诉讼案作出裁决，其中的一句话暂时缓解了人们的担忧，即这些案件可能为特朗普随意解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔打开大门。【原文：A U.S. Supreme Court ruling Thursday in a legal battle over President Donald Trump's firing of two federal labor board members contained a line that eased, for now, worries that the cases could open the door for Trump to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at will.】

item.title: 瑞银上调标普年底目标，预计 2026 年涨幅更大
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）周四将 S&P 500 指数的年底目标从 5,800 点上调至 6,000 点，并将 2026 年 6 月的目标定为 6,400 点。【原文：UBS Global Wealth Management on Thursday raised its year-end target for the S&P 500 to 6,000 from 5,800 and initiated a June 2026 target of 6,400.】

item.title: 为阿片类药物制造商普渡制药提供咨询的前麦肯锡合伙人被判入狱
item.description: 周四，麦肯锡公司的一名前合伙人因销毁与该咨询公司向普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）提供的关于如何 "加速 "阿片类止痛药奥施康定（OxyContin）销售的建议有关的记录而妨碍司法公正，被判处六个月监禁。【原文：A former McKinsey & Co partner was sentenced on Thursday to six months in prison for obstructing justice by destroying records related to advice the consulting firm gave Purdue Pharma on how to "turbocharge" sales of the opioid painkiller OxyContin.】

item.title: 消息人士称，菲利普斯 66 洛杉矶炼油厂将于 12 月开始裁员
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士周四透露，菲利普斯 66 预计将于 12 月解雇洛杉矶地区日产量 13.9 万桶炼油厂的大部分工人。【原文：Phillips 66 is expected to lay off most workers at its 139,000-barrel-per-day Los Angeles-area refinery in December, sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: YouTube 聘用前迪士尼资深员工负责体育和媒体业务
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 YouTube 周四表示，该公司已聘请迪士尼的长期高管贾斯汀-康诺利（Justin Connolly）担任媒体和体育部门的全球主管，因为该视频服务正在进一步进军体育和传统媒体领域。【原文：Alphabet's YouTube has hired long-time Walt Disney executive Justin Connolly to serve as its global head of media and sports, the company said on Thursday, as the video service pushes further into sports and traditional media.】

item.title: 独家报道美国专家小组对新日铁竞购美国钢铁公司意见不一，但官员称已看到前进的道路
item.description: 一位白宫官员周四告诉路透社记者，一个强大的国家安全小组在就新日铁竞购美国钢铁公司对国家安全的影响向唐纳德-特朗普总统提出建议时意见不一。【原文：A powerful national security panel was divided in its recommendation to President Donald Trump on the national security implications of Nippon Steel's bid for U.S. Steel , a White House official told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国起诉被控勒索软件攻击的俄罗斯人
item.description: 美国司法部周四公布了对一名俄罗斯人的指控，他被指控在十多年间领导开发和部署了感染数千台电脑的恶意软件。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice on Thursday unsealed charges against a Russian national accused of leading the development and deployment of malicious software that infected thousands of computers over more than a decade.】

item.title: 阿克曼的对冲基金潘兴广场押注亚马逊，退出加拿大太平洋公司
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）周四告诉客户，他的对冲基金上个月买入了亚马逊股票，押注这家在线零售商的盈利将继续增长，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税影响比消费者最初担心的要小。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman told clients on Thursday that his hedge fund bought Amazon shares last month, betting earnings will continue to grow at the online retailer as President Donald Trump's tariffs bite less than consumers initially feared.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，OnlyFans 所有者正在洽谈以约 80 亿美元的价格出售给投资集团
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，OnlyFans 的所有者 Fenix International Ltd 正在洽谈将这家色情驱动的公司出售给一个投资集团，估值约为 80 亿美元。 消息人士称，该集团由总部位于洛杉矶的投资公司 Forest Road Company 牵头。路透社无法确认该集团投资者的身份。【原文：OnlyFans owner Fenix International Ltd is in talks to sell the porn-driven company to an investor group at a valuation of around $8 billion, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters. The group is led by the Forest Road Company, a Los Angeles-based investment firm, the sources said. Reuters could not identify the investors in the group.】

item.title: 交易日：紧张维持的抛售
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: Workday 预测季度订阅收入冷淡，股价下跌
item.description: 周四，Workday 预测第二季度订阅收入与华尔街预期一致，预计由于经济不确定性，客户在其人力资本管理软件上的支出将减弱，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 5%。【原文：Workday forecast second-quarter subscription revenue in line with Wall Street expectations on Thursday, anticipating weakening client spending on its human capital management software due to economic uncertainty, sending its shares down 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 关于特朗普税收法案中的 SALT 扣除，您需要了解什么？
item.description: 生活在房产税和所得税较高的州的富裕阶层可能会在唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收计划中得到一些减免。【原文：Affluent earners who live in states with high property and income taxes may see some relief in President Donald Trump's tax plan.】

item.title: 交易商为欧佩克+价格战做好准备，美国原油存储需求激增
item.description: 根据储油经纪商 The Tank Tiger 的数据，最近几周美国原油储油需求激增，达到了类似于 COVID-19 大流行时的水平，因为交易商们正在为石油输出国组织及其盟国未来几个月供应量的大量增加做好准备。【原文：U.S. crude oil storage demand has surged in recent weeks to levels similar to the COVID-19 pandemic, according to data from storage broker The Tank Tiger, as traders brace for a flood of increased supply in coming months from the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies.】

item.title: 美国机构称内华达大盆地的地热能源可发挥更大作用
item.description: 美国地质调查局（U.S. Geological Survey）周四表示，内华达州大盆地及邻近各州的地热能源可生产相当于美国目前电力供应10%的电力。【原文：Geothermal energy in the Great Basin of Nevada and adjoining states could produce electricity equivalent to 10% of the current U.S. power supply, the U.S. Geological Survey said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会撤销微软 690 亿美元动视暴雪交易案
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）周四撤销了一项试图阻止微软以 690 亿美元收购《使命召唤》制造商动视暴雪公司（Activision Blizzard）的诉讼，称继续对这一关闭已久的交易提起诉讼不符合公众利益。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission dropped a case that sought to block Microsoft's $69-billion purchase of "Call of Duty" maker Activision Blizzard, saying on Thursday that pursuing the case against the long-closed deal was not in the public interest.】

item.title: 软件需求强劲，欧特克上调年度业绩预期
item.description: 欧特克（Autodesk）周四上调了 2026 财年的收入和调整后利润预期，预计各行业对其设计和工程软件的需求强劲，股价在盘后交易中上涨约 2%。【原文：Autodesk raised its forecast for fiscal 2026 revenue and adjusted profit on Thursday, anticipating strong demand for its design and engineering software used across various industries, sending its shares up around 2% in extended trading.】

item.title: 联邦贸易委员会撤销指控百事可乐价格歧视的案件
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四撤销了指控百事可乐公司对沃尔玛实行价格歧视的案件，并批评前主席莉娜-汗（Lina Khan）匆忙结案。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Thursday dropped its case accusing PepsiCo of price discrimination that favored Walmart , and criticized former Chair Lina Khan for rushing the case out.】

item.title: 受关税压力影响，罗斯百货撤回年度预测
item.description: 折扣店运营商罗斯百货公司（Ross Stores）周四撤回了 2025 财年的销售和利润预期，并表示关税可能会影响其今年的盈利能力，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 8%。【原文：Discount store operator Ross Stores on Thursday withdrew its fiscal 2025 sales and profit forecasts and said tariffs could take a toll on its profitability this year, sending its shares down 8% in extended trading.】

item.title: 迪拉德百货公司就联名卡关系起诉富国银行
item.description: 百货连锁店迪拉德百货公司（Dillard's）周四起诉富国银行（Wells Fargo），称该银行多次违反已经放弃的联名信用卡关系，给连锁百货公司造成了数千万美元的损失。【原文：The department store chain Dillard's sued Wells Fargo on Thursday, saying the bank repeatedly breached a since-abandoned co-branded credit card relationship, causing the department store chain tens of millions of dollars in losses.】

item.title: Intuit 预计在税季提振后实现强劲的季度利润
item.description: Intuit 周四预计第四季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，这表明市场对其人工智能驱动的财务管理工具的需求不断增长，并使其股价在延时交易中上涨超过 5%。【原文：Intuit forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling growing demand for its artificial intelligence-driven financial management tools and sending its shares up more than 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果计划于 2026 年推出智能眼镜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，苹果公司计划在明年年底推出智能眼镜，这是这家 iPhone 制造商为丰富其产品阵容和提高人工智能设备需求而采取的最新举措。【原文：Apple plans to release smart glasses at the end of next year, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, in the iPhone maker's latest push to diversify its product lineup and boost demand for its artificial intelligence devices.】

item.title: 雀巢旗下雀巢咖啡公司将向巴西业务追加投资 8,900 万美元
item.description: 雀巢旗下的雀巢咖啡品牌周四在向记者介绍情况时表示，计划到2028年在巴西追加投资5亿雷亚尔（合8870万美元）。【原文：Nestle's Nescafe plans to invest an additional 500 million reais ($88.7 million) in Brazil by 2028, the coffee brand said on Thursday in a presentation to journalists.】

item.title: 意大利总统塔亚尼：欧盟与墨西哥的贸易协议可能在年底前敲定
item.description: 意大利外交部长安东尼奥-塔亚尼（Antonio Tajani）周四表示，欧盟与墨西哥之间长期停滞不前的自由贸易协定可能在今年年底前签署。【原文：A long-stalled free trade agreement between the European Union and Mexico could be signed by the end of the year, Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani said on Thursday.】

item.title: 智利与力拓合作开发第二个大型锂项目
item.description: 全球矿业巨头力拓本周第二次被智利选中参与一个新的大型锂矿项目，国营矿业机构ENAMI在周四的一份声明中将力拓列为其Altoandinos锂矿项目的合作伙伴。【原文：Global miner Rio Tinto has been selected by Chile for the second time this week for a major new lithium project, with state-run mining body ENAMI naming it a partner for its Altoandinos lithium project in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储主席珀利鼓励企业使用常备回购机制
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行一位负责执行货币政策的官员周四表示，该央行正在鼓励使用一种关键的流动性工具，迄今为止，这种工具在很大程度上处于休眠状态。【原文：A Federal Reserve Bank of New York official responsible for implementing monetary policy said on Thursday the central bank is encouraging usage of a key liquidity tool that thus far has been largely dormant.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，Impactive Capital 或将参与 WEX 的代理权争夺战，寻求 11 位董事中的 4 位
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士和路透社看到的一份文件称，激进投资者 Impactive Capital 正在为金融科技公司 WEX Inc 的董事会斗争做准备，并可能在明年的年会上提名至少四名董事。【原文：Activist investor Impactive Capital is gearing up for a boardroom fight at financial technology company WEX Inc , and may nominate at least four directors at next year's annual meeting, according to a person familiar with the matter and a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 尚未完成：美国参议院共和党人计划修改众议院的特朗普减税法案
item.description: 美国参议院共和党人周四表示，他们将寻求对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的全面税收和支出法案进行实质性修改，此前该法案在众议院以微弱优势获得批准，这表明该方案仍面临重大障碍。【原文：U.S. Senate Republicans said on Thursday they will seek substantial changes to President Donald Trump's sweeping tax and spending bill after it narrowly won approval in the House of Representatives, in a sign that significant hurdles remain for the package.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，美国联邦贸易委员会就马斯克抵制 X 的言论对 Media Matters 进行调查
item.description: 据路透社周四看到的一份文件显示，美国联邦贸易委员会要求 Media Matters 提供文件，说明可能与被埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）指控帮助策划广告商抵制 X 的其他媒体监督机构进行的协调。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has demanded documents from Media Matters about possible coordination with other media watchdogs accused by Elon Musk of helping orchestrate advertiser boycotts of X, according to a document seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: Tinder 首席执行官伊奥索塔鲁诺将于七月卸任
item.description: Tinder 首席执行官菲-伊奥索塔鲁诺（Faye Iosotaluno）周四表示，她将于 7 月份卸任，因为该交友软件的目标是吸引更多用户。【原文：Tinder CEO Faye Iosotaluno said on Thursday that she would step down in July, as the dating app aims to attract more users.】
